tweets.text:
At Health Questions I asked @MattHancock about the public health implications of the breaches at Walley's Quarry.

I know, from both the local GPs and those writing to me, that many residents are concerned for their health, both physically and mentally. @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/pwh6zUI4Zs

tweets.text: The air purifiers have started to go out to people in need. @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency  Look at this poor woman's eyes! This cannot be allowed to go on. Hang your heads in shame #capitoff #stopthestink https://t.co/g7kUIqLdzd

@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @GretaThunberg Walleys landfill is an environmental disaster.  You gave @RedIndustries2 until the 30th April to sort the pollution. It’s the 12th April and it’s getting worse.  Why are you letting one company make the lives of thousands a misery.

tweets.text: My brother recently asked for freedom of information regarding sewage dumped in the Sussex Rother (which killed fish populations). It’s all legal. We know this is happening, but nothing is done. It affects us all, nature-lovers or not. https://t.co/oMWWxNrJPZ https://t.co/MSpj76pUCF
https://t.co/eXqrEno2Qa

ये आग कब बुझेगी: पिछले साढ़े 3 महीनों में उत्तराखंड के 2500 हेक्टेयर से अधिक जंगल जलकर हुए खाक
रिपोर्ट: @deepakrawat1298
#uttarakhandforestfire @Anoopnautiyal1 @UKFireServices #Watch
खबर पढ़ें: https://t.co/czo2w91iVc https://t.co/JbmgHeGwhD

Well done for catching them.  I saw your clip posted on Facebook by SE Rivers Trust who said @EnvAgency are on the case.  @pippamaslin @MarkGale @harryhpalmer @MitchamCrktGrn @MitchamSociety I would like to see a response from @Merton_Council  as clients.  @MartinWhelton? https://t.co/2cheU1zstm

tweets.text: @WHO You Advise ventilate rooms and open windows regularly, #COVID We in Newcastle under Lyme can’t do this as our fresh air is poisoned with rancid toxic smells omitted by local quarry. Health is being affected. PLEASE HELP US  @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @MattHancock @PHE_uk

@PhilipGlanville @metecoban92 @chrismylesk @EnvAgency @jonburkeUK We hope that @StellaCreasy @DavidLammy @KateOsamor join you too we’ve written to them re the impact of #sewage pollution on our local @IUCNRedList #eels, critically endangered, #watervole, & BAP kingfisher et al & importance of #CleanWater & #HealthyRivers for #ClimateResilience

tweets.text: @grrfy @AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids I live in Chesterton and have been able to smell it for the past few years. Obviously it’s got worse. My parents live in Trent Vale and the smell is exactly the same so it can’t be coincidence! It’s like we’re being slowly gassed! I’ve got a permanent headache.

tweets.text:
Y'day, @metecoban92, @chrismylesk & I wrote to @EnvAgency demanding action to clean up River Lea & associated waterways. It builds on letter @jonburkeUK & I sent before.
It's unacceptable residents, wildlife & visitors have to put up with this.
Thanks to those who got in touch. https://t.co/cISAOKNhoP

tweets.text: Good lord, this makes me cry. What on earth are you doing to protect our most vulnerable precious elderly citizens @PHE_EoEngland ? Your silence makes you just as culpable as the @EnvAgency Utterly shameful @BBCPanorama https://t.co/ncNeUPnSeQ

tweets.text: @SaveLeaMarshes I called the Lee Valley hotline on Sunday about illegal fishing right by the kingfishers. While trying to let them know where they were (they’d climbed through a fence) I offered to use what3words to help & she refused. It’s so much easier to locate issues. All should use it.

@VisitRossOnWye @rowgc @RossGazette @HfdsGN @greenhereford @HerefordshireWT @herefordtimes @EnvAgency @GeorgeMonbiot @theriverstrust @RiverActionUK @CleanIlkley @wyebeauty @Jesse_Norman @Ross_CDT @RossonWyeTA @rosssportsclub @RossNoticeboard @RossiterBooks #nature #homeoftourism https://t.co/fJcXe5O9QE

tweets.text: @fayedavies @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL I know, the nights are the worst aren't they, stink getting stronger now, feelsli,e someone is pumping toxic gas through the letterbox, once it's inside it doesn't leave, something the monitors don't capture. Going to be another long night, hope you get some sleep.
@AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids was bad again last night in Trent Vale, woken at about 4am with sore nose ,throat etc etc. One day it will be an actual gas leak...

tweets.text:
Never in my life in the UK did I think fresh air would be a luxury but this is our life now in #newcastleunderlyme A family member has taken me to get the freshest air because where I live cant provide us with that anymore.

@EnvAgencyMids @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe #STOPTHESTINK https://t.co/Dv2UXf6ZbA
